summary: The Washington Redskins are a professional American football team based in the Washington, D.C.
full_text: FedExField  is a football stadium located in an unincorporated area near the Capital Beltway  in Prince George's County, Maryland, United States, near the site of the old Capital Centre . FedExField is the home of the Washington Redskins football team. From 2004 until 2010, it had the largest stadium capacity in the National Football League , at over 91,000. Currently, the capacity is 82,000.
title: FedExField
